column2: I don't want to sound like a killjoy, but becuase this is not to my taste I don't think anyone else should be allowed to enjoy it.
But my mom says I'm cool.
column4: Well, I'm better than dirt. Well, most kinds of dirt. I mean not that fancy store bought dirt. That stuffs loaded with nutrients. I.. I can't compete with that stuff.

column2: Remember the time he ate my goldfish? And you lied and said I never had a goldfish. Then why did I have the bowl, Bart? Why did I have the bowl?
